entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
